Text.Name: Gong_LifeBurning
Text.Desc: Increases abilities for a short time at the expense of damage to body when it finishes.

Text.Name: Gong_DevilBlood
Text.Desc: Communicate with the Celestial Demons and completely demonize one's body, greatly improving physical quality and cultivation speed. But from now on, one would be despised by celestials and mortals alike.

Text.Name: Gong_DevilBlood_LianHun
Text.Desc: Enduring torture, the soul has borne great pains.

Text.Name: Gong_HunTin_Self
Text.Desc: Due to splitting out a part of the Primordial Spirit to perform Soul Infection, the character's consciousness is damaged. Intelligence, Cultivation Speed and Inspiration Obtaining Speed will be slightly reduced.

Text.Name: Gong_TaHua_Self
Text.Desc: Perform the Exploitation technique to obtain Inspiration and Cultivation from the minds of other living beings. However, it will reduce the base value of Mood and Mental State as a result.

Text.Name: Gong_TaHua_Self1
Text.Desc: Perform the Exploitation technique to obtain Inspiration and Cultivation from the minds of other living beings. However, it will reduce the base value of Mood and Mental State as a result.
